snippet.title: A: Stripping non-alphanumeric chars but leaving spaces in Ruby
snippet.description: If you want to catch non-latins characters as well: str = "The basketball-player is great! (Kobe Bryant) (ひらがな)" str.downcase.gsub(/[^[[:word:]]\s]/, '') #=> "the basketballplayer is great kobe bryant ひらがな" …
